title: Application for License to the Licensing Authority
desc: Official PDF document detailing the application process for obtaining an FSSAI License/Registration from the Licensing Authority in India.

title: प्ररूप सं० 9
desc: Hindi PDF form related to the FSSAI License/Registration process, designating responsible individuals for food safety compliance.

title: License & Registration FAQs
desc: Frequently asked questions about the FSSAI License/Registration process, providing answers to common queries for businesses in India.

title: Updating PAN While Renewal of License
desc: PDF guide on updating PAN information during the renewal of an FSSAI License/Registration through the FoSCoS portal.

title: Food Safety and Compliance System Guidance Document
desc: Guidance document for FSSAI officers, state food safety departments, and Food Business Operators on the FoSCoS system.

title: Proof of Identity of Applicant
desc: Sample document showing the proof of identity required for applicants seeking FSSAI License/Registration.

title: Import Export Code (IEC) Document
desc: Sample document for the Import Export Code required for FSSAI License/Registration, issued by the Director General of Foreign Trade.

title: Consumer Grievance Lodging Guide
desc: PDF guide for consumers on how to lodge grievances related to FSSAI License/Registration issues through the FoSCoS system.

title: Himachal Pradesh Document Requirements
desc: Document outlining specific requirements for FSSAI License/Registration in Himachal Pradesh, India.
